description:
As it turns out there's a few new things going on in mobile, this seemed like a good chance for everyone to have a catch up!

Thanks to the guys at The Real Adventure for hosting us.

Speakers:

• Dan Leivers: What's new in iOS

• Scott Alexander-Bown: What's new in Android

• Andy Barber: Intro to Android Wear

Also thanks to our event sponsors:

https://www.odesk.com/

Sign up at odesk, and redeem code "cloudshout2014" for a $50 credit against your first job posted (new customers only). That could be enough to get some copy written, research a market or create an app logo.
title: What's new in mobile
